info.criteria: m.exe injecting into lsass.exe to dump credentials

info.criteria: m.exe injecting into lsass.exe to dump credentials

info.criteria: m.exe injecting into lsass.exe to dump credentials
info.note: An MSSP detection for "Credential Dumping" was received that described the adversary remotely executing m.exe to dump the krbtgt hash.
A General detection (10) was generated when smrs.exe is identified as Mimikatz.

info.criteria: samcat.exe opens and reads the SAM via LSASS
info.note: A General detection named "S0002 Mimikatz" (9) was generated when samcat.exe was identified as Mimikatz.
Test 3 was blocked when smrs.exe could not be executed, because the output file was empty.

info.criteria: samcat.exe opens and reads the SAM via LSASS
info.note: Test 12 was blocked when uac-samcats.ps1 failed, because samcat.exe was removed upon creation, because it was identified as Mimikatz.

info.criteria: powershell.exe executes Find-LocalAdminAccess, which attempts a DCOM/RPC (port 135) connection to multiple hosts to check for access
powershell.exe executes Find-LocalAdminAccess, which attempts a DCOM/RPC (port 135) connection to multiple hosts to check for access
info.note: A General detection (3) was generated when powershell.exe executed Find-LocalAdminAccess, which connected to multiple hosts over port 135 to check for access.
A Technique detection named "T1056 Input Capture (Keylogging)" (4) was generated when analysis of DLL modules in DefenderUpgradeExec.exe showed SetWindowsHookEx.

info.criteria: rundll32.exe spawns cmd.exe then powershell.exe to search Outlook for password strings
cmd.exe executes vssadmin.exe to create a copy of C:
User root executes cat to read /etc/shadow
User root executes cat to read /home/fherbert/.bash_history
oradump.exe reads passwords from local browsers DBs
powershell executing Copy-Item pointing to an attack-controlled WebDav network share (192.168.0.4:80)
info.note: A General alert detection (yellow indicator) was generated due to rundll32.exe executing the API Call DavSetCookie in daclnt.dll to map a share using WebDav.

info.criteria: powershell.exe executing Copy-Item pointing to drive mapped to an attack-controlled OneDrive account
info.note: A General alert detection (blue indicator) was generated identifying PowerShell executing Copy-Item as threat activity.

info.criteria: powershell.exe executing Copy-Item pointing to drive mapped to an attack-controlled OneDrive account

info.criteria: Network connection to NewYork (10.0.0.4) over port 5985

info.criteria: Network connection to NewYork (10.0.0.4) over port 5985
info.note: An MSSP detection for "Windows Remote Management" was received that included a PowerShell command and explained that it was used to create a WinRM session to host Scranton (10.0.1.4).

info.criteria: Network connection to Scranton (10.0.1.4) over port 5985

info.criteria: Network connection to Scranton (10.0.1.4) over port 5985
